statistics.name: assists
statistics.description: The number of times a player who passes the ball to a teammate in a way that leads to a score by field goal, meaning that he or she was "assisting" in the basket. There is some judgment involved in deciding whether a passer should be credited with an assist.

statistics.name: turnovers
statistics.description: The number of times a player loses possession to the other team.

statistics.description: The total number of minutes played.

statistics.name: assistTurnoverRatio
statistics.description: The average number of assists a player or team records per turnover

statistics.name: rebounds
statistics.description: The total number of rebounds (offensive and defensive).

statistics.name: defensiveRebounds
statistics.description: The number of times when the defense obtains the possession of the ball after a missed shot by the offense.

article.description: Coastal Carolina tops Longwood, 76-70, to go 3-0
article.headline: Coastal Carolina tops Longwood, 76-70, to go 3-0
article.linkText: Coastal Carolina tops Longwood, 76-70, to go 3-0
article.story: CONWAY, S.C. -- Warren Gillis and Shivaughn Wiggins both scored 15 points as Coastal Carolina held off Longwood, 76-70 for a 3-0 start to the Big South Conference season Thursday night. The Chanticleers built a 34-26 lead in the first half and Badou Diagne and Elijah Wilson helped push it to as many as 12 points in the second half by knocking down 3-pointers. Wiggins was 9 of 10 from the free throw line en route to his 15 point effort and Diagne added 13 points and 12 rebounds for Coastal Carolina (12-3, 3-0 Big South). As a team, Coastal Carolina was 25 of 54 from the field, hitting 7 of 19 from distance, and converted 19 of 26 from the free throw line. Lotanna Nwogbo was 10 of 14 from the field to lead Longwood (5-11, 1-2) with 23 points. Quincy Taylor added 14 points and Leron Fisher added another 12.
